name: CLAPPING PARTY GB
description:
"Whoa! Jackpot! Blood Bleeder? Head Chopper 2? Scab Wars? Blistergeist!?"

"Oh, those are off-limits. We're only allowed to play Clapping Party."

Based on an easter egg from Strong Bad Email 180, "slumber party". Really stretches the definition of "game". Press B (x on keyboard controls) to clap. Press select (shift on standard keyboard controls) to see how many rounds you've done. See how long you can clap for and always be'sing and do'sing.
